solution_line_template: There are {minutes_per_hour} minutes in an hour, and {seconds_per_minute} seconds in a minute so there are {minutes_per_hour}*{seconds_per_minute} = <<{minutes_per_hour}*{seconds_per_minute}={seconds_in_hour}>>{seconds_in_hour} seconds in an hour

The device records data every {recording_interval_seconds} seconds so there will be {seconds_in_hour}/{recording_interval_seconds} = <<{seconds_in_hour}/{recording_interval_seconds}={total_data_instances}>>{total_data_instances} instances of data in an hour.
